resources.string:
App Name: Expiry Reminder
Third-Party Library used:
 
Expandable RecyclerView underMIT LicenseLicense File: 
https://github.com/bignerdranch/expandable-recycler-view/blob/master/LICENSE

https://github.com/zxing/zxing/blob/master/LICENSE

Notice File:
https://github.com/zxing/zxing/blob/master/NOTICENo changes has been madeCopyright: https://github.com/zxing/zxing/blob/master/AUTHORS 

External Resources used: 

Guide: How to implement Expandable RecyclerView
http://bignerdranch.github.io/expandable-recycler-view/


Guide: How to implement ZXing
https://github.com/zxing/zxing/wiki/Scanning-Via-Intent


Guide: How to set up nofiticiation alarm
https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/notifiers/notifications.html


Guide: How to make editText editable
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/13411407/editable-textview-on-click#
